name: REST
description: Full-service restaurants, cafes, bars, food trucks, and other food service establishments
serving_location: Physical restaurant, cafe, or food service location

name: RETAIL
description: General retail stores selling various consumer products including clothing, electronics, home goods, and general merchandise

name: GROCERY
description: Grocery stores, supermarkets, convenience stores, and markets selling food and household items

name: PHARMACY
description: Pharmacies, drug stores, health and wellness stores selling medications and health products
serving_location: Physical pharmacy or health store location

name: FASHION
description: Clothing stores, boutiques, shoe stores, and fashion retail outlets

name: ELECTRONICS
description: Electronics stores, computer shops, mobile phone retailers, and technology stores

name: SALON
description: Hair salons, beauty parlors, barbershops, spa, and beauty service providers

name: AUTO
description: Auto parts stores, car accessories shops, and automotive service providers
serving_location: Physical automotive store or service center

name: FUEL
description: Gas stations, fuel pumps, and service stations selling fuel and related products

name: HOTEL
description: Hotels, lodges, guest houses, and hospitality establishments with POS systems

name: BOOKSTORE
description: Bookstores, stationery shops, and stores selling books, office supplies, and educational materials

name: SPORTS
description: Sports equipment stores, fitness centers, and recreational equipment retailers
serving_location: Physical sports store or fitness center

name: JEWELRY
description: Jewelry stores, watch shops, and stores selling precious metals and accessories

name: FURNITURE
description: Furniture stores, home decor shops, and stores selling furniture and home furnishings

name: ONLINE
description: Online retailers, e-commerce platforms, and businesses primarily selling online

name: OTHER
description: Other types of businesses not covered in the above categories
